name: roguestep
description:
Arrow keys to move. You can only move when it's possible to attack something. (you can attack trees).

There's no ending. just see how high a level you can get to. Beholders are the final enemy and they can show up from floor 19.

New game button in the top right if needed.

Known Issues

  • There's a possibility you'll get a level that is incompletable :(
  • There's a possibility that you'll get a game over even if you still can do a move :(

Using Kenny assets https://kenney.nl/assets/micro-roguelike

Made for trijam 171, theme "Watch your step". I spent about about 5/6 hours on it.
